article_title: The ACA, Obamacare, Has Reduced US GDP By 5%

article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall

og.description: This will perhaps be a contentious claim to some, that Obamacare, or the Affordable Care Act as it is more formally known, will reduce long run GDP in the US by 5%. But it shouldn't actually be all that contentious: the basic idea most certainly has merit even if the [...]
